spec_data.Name: gfal2-plugin-rfio
spec_data.Description:
Provides the rfio support (rfio://) for gfal2.
The rfio plugin provides the POSIX operations for
the rfio URLs, the rfio protocol is used on the DPM
and on the Castor storage systems.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 09:53:29 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provides the rfio support for gfal2
